title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 193.2 - Written statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 193.2 - Written statement

State Regulations

The terms and conditions of employment shall be contained
in a written statement and shall be acceptable to the board of education or
board of trustees and the Family Court. Copies of the written statement shall
be provided to all parties concerned, including the juvenile, the board of
education or board of trustees, the court, and the probation department or
agency which submits probation recommendations or reports to the
court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
193.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
